title: Smartphone users in Canada 2013 to 2023
summary: Overall Smartphone users in millions has increased over the Year.
Smartphone users in millions is slightly increasing from 2020 to 2023.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2020 and 2021.
The highest Smartphone users in millions, of value 30.4 was reached at Year 2023
The lowest Smartphone users in millions, of value 27.7 was reported at Year 2020
min_summary: In general Smartphone users in millions has rose over the Year.
